articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT Annika Lewis
The lack of structure & process in DAOs can be super disheartening
When the frustration hits: 
Stop and reflect on the fact that we're building the future - without this open design space, there wouldn't be opportunity
Working through the ambiguity *is* the work

articles.description:
RT DavidHoffman.eth 🔴_🔴 🦇🔊🏴
Re 5⃣ There's not enough talent to go around
Everyone is hiring, but there's no one left to hire
We need Web2 engineers to drop everything, go down the crypto rabbit hole, and reemerge as Web3 talent
We have fucktons of money, but no further talent to spend it on
MOOAAR DEVS PLS
